metadata.description: Just outside our galaxy the atrocities of slavery thrive, and young Thorby is just another orphaned boy sold at auction. But when he crosses paths with a mysterious crippled beggar, his destiny is forever changed. Citizen of the Galaxy is an interstellar action/adventure coming of age tale by the "Dean of Science Fiction"... Robert A. Heinlein!
metadata.name: Robert Heinlein's Citizen of the Galaxy
